channel.title: ML For Networked Systems on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in ML For Networked Systems on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Class 1: Introduction
item.description: Welcome Happy New Year! Welcome to this special-topics course, AI/ML for Networked Systems. Introductions In today’s class, we will spend some time learning more about each other. Please share: Which year of (under) graduate studies are you in at UCSB? What are your plans after graduation? What is your area of research (if any)? What problem are you working on these days (if any)? What motivated you to take this course?
